statement.p: In 27.27 of the last 33 days it rained. How many days did it not rain? days

solution.p: We recall that a percent as a decimal is part/whole. Here that is \displaystyle\frac{{P}}{{33}}={0.2727}. We solve for P by multiplying by \displaystyle{33}. \displaystyle{P}={0.2727}\cdot{33}={8.9991}. This is the number of days that it rained. We want the non-rainy days which is 33-8.9991=24.0009 We round that as requested to 24.
